item.title: Review Rurouni Kenshin (2012): A Redeeming Samurai Tale with Strong Chemistry
item.description: The 2012 live-action adaptation of the popular manga, Rurouni Kenshin, delivers intense samurai action, strong on-screen chemistry, and an emotional story of redemption.
